question:
Superb structures of Brahma, Vishnu, and Siva were set up at which of the following places during the rule of Chalukyas in the Deccan?
1) Badami
2) Pattadakal
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Chalukyas were the followers of the Brahmanical religion. During their rule, the Pauranic deities rose into prominence. Superb structures were set up at Vatapi or Badami and Pattadakal (Bijapur District) in honour of Brahma, Vishnu and Siva.
